name: The Backwoods
description:
The Backwoods is a game in which you play as a seven eyed goat detective looking for your daughter, exploring a bizarre and sometimes surreal environment and talking to similar characters.

This is primarily a narrative and art driven game, in which the main key features are the characters themselves and the dialogue they provide. 

Dev Note: Please keep in mind this is my first game, created under university time constraints and as such, it may be lacking. If offering critique, please comment on the writing instead of the gameplay as that would personally benefit me the most, thank you! 

Known Bugs: Controls page may cause crash upon clicking 'back'.
